item.title: Robin Hansons LMSR inplain english.
item.description: Theorem 1 Proof of space. Hi bvnbnbnbn nhnhnhnh $z = x + y$. just $$ \begin{equation}\label{label} \frac{\mathrm{d}}{\mathrm{d} x} \int_{a}^{x} f(s)ds = f(x) \end{equation} $$
